54 : 24 = x : 2

108 = 24 * x
x = 108 / 24

Ka hona, haeba kgwedi e na le matsatsi a 30, Jason o tla sebedisa metsotso e 10.5 ka letsatsi ha a ntse a latela kemiso eo o e hlalositseng. Ke tshepa hore sena se araba potso ya hao.<eos>
